description: Ginta`s friend in his own world, who has often taken care of him. She has a strong connection to Princess Snow. Not only does she look just like her, the two of them often see the other`s world through their eyes in their dreams. She uses this to keep track of how Ginta is doing, and tells Ginta`s mother what`s going on. She also collects his schoolbooks and homework, and plans to make Ginta study hard to catch up when he gets back. At the end of the series Koyuki begins to grow feelings for Ginta.
name: Koyuki
